title: Sample Aliquotting
author: Opentrons
description: Using this protocol, your robot will aliquot samples from a single 1.5 mL tube to up to 239 empty 1.5 mL tubes. This protocol would require our 4-in-1 Tube Rack Set. User can change the aspirate and dispense speeds for solutions with various viscosity.
process:
Input the number of aliquots you would like to create.
Input the desired aspirate and dispense speed (UNIT: uL/sec; DEFAULT: aspirate=25, dispense=50).
Input the aliquot volume.
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
Robot will aliquot your sample in well A1 of tube rack in slot 1 to the rest of the tubes.
notes:
Your sample is always in well A1 of the tube rack in slot 1.
If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.

markdown.title: Sample Aliquotting
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: Using this protocol, your robot will aliquot samples from a single 1.5 mL tube to up to 239 empty 1.5 mL tubes. This protocol would require our [4-in-1 Tube Rack Set](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips/products/tube-rack-set-1). User can change the aspirate and dispense speeds for solutions with various viscosity.
markdown.process:
1. Input the number of aliquots you would like to create.
2. Input the desired aspirate and dispense speed (UNIT: uL/sec; DEFAULT: aspirate=25, dispense=50).
3. Input the aliquot volume.
4. Download your protocol.
5. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
6. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
7. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
8. Hit "Run".
9. Robot will aliquot your sample in well A1 of tube rack in slot 1 to the rest of the tubes.
markdown.notes:
Your sample is *always* in well A1 of the tube rack in slot 1.

If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.
